Package com.hexaware.dao.serviceImpl

Class CustomerServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.serviceImpl.CustomerServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICustomerService
public class CustomerServiceImpl extends Object implements ICustomerService
Implementation of the ICustomerService interface for managing customer operations in the database.
